DependencyItem.Message: MyFilms requires Mediaportal 1.2.
DependencyItem.Name: MediaPortal

DependencyItem.Message: To use My Films online help and preview IMDB pages, BrowseTheWeb version 0.30 (0.3.0) or higher must be installed.
DependencyItem.Name: Browse The Web

DependencyItem.Message: To access online trailers (incl. IMDB) from MyFilms, Online Videos v0.29 (0.29.1) or higher must be installed.
DependencyItem.Name: OnlineVideos

DependencyItem.Message: To use subtitles the SubCentral Plugin with min. version 1.1.0.0 is required.
DependencyItem.Name: SubCentral

DependencyItem.Message: To use film synchronisation and recommendations, you need Trakt plugin with version of 1.0.5.1 or above.
DependencyItem.Name: Trakt for MediaPortal

GeneralInfo.Name: MyFilms
GeneralInfo.Author: Zebons, Guzzi
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
MyFilms is a plugin to use your ANTmovie catalog (AMC) video database or other external catalog managers in mediaportal.
The My Films plugin allows you to combine the media center features of MediaPortal with the advantages of the movie catalog/database of your choice - like the popular freeware Ant Movie Catalog (AMC), EAX Movie Catalog, Personal Video Database or shareware catalogs like DVD Profiler, Extreme Movie Manager (XMM), My Movies or Movie Collector.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
This Version is the final release of MyFilms 5.
Please report bugs in MyFilms forum.
GeneralInfo.Tags: movies, films, videos, myfilms, catalog, manager, ant movie catalog (amc), dvdprofiler, extreme movie manager, xbmc, personal video database (pvd), eax movie catalog (eax), dvd profiler, extreme movie manager (xmm) , movie collector pro, mymovies

GeneralInfo.Name: MyFilms
GeneralInfo.Author: Zebons, Guzzi
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
MyFilms is a movie plugin to use your ANTmovie catalog (AMC) video database or other external catalog managers in mediaportal.
The My Films plugin allows you to combine the media center features of MediaPortal with the advantages of the movie catalog/database of your choice - like the popular freeware Ant Movie Catalog (AMC), EAX Movie Catalog, Personal Video Database or shareware catalogs like DVD Profiler, Extreme Movie Manager (XMM), My Movies or Movie Collector.
My Films offers a huge amout of features to use and manage your movie collection inside and outside Mediaportal.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
This version is a maintenance release of MyFilms 6.0.
Please report bugs in MyFilms forum.
Changes & Fixes: - With multi part movies a "watched" event is send after each part - person role should be removed from label2 in related persons view - Add new property to show info about related context - Internal IMDB person info grabber stopped working due to IMDB changes - Random Fanart does not display when Reverse Person Names is enabled - Some Person Image files being saved in wrong directory - Bluray from folder do not natively play with MP1.3alpha - '&' not correctly displayed in Movie Titles and cover does not display in facade - Rework of internal dialog handling - Navigation engine does have inconsistant behaviour for start settings - Custom Movie Group Settings are not applied in GUI and Layout is not saved. - Back navigation sets visibility condition too late - MP language is not properly detected and used - View Options context menu options do not work correctly for Group lists - Download Person Images (selected film) displays on Main window context menu under Updates - Move 'Import if no auto match' setting from AMCU to MF Setup and add to MF GUI options - Allow edition of previously created filter expressions for views - Grabber Interface - Detail tab : "Genre" should be "Category"
GeneralInfo.Tags: movies, films, videos, myfilms, catalog, manager, ant movie catalog (amc), dvdprofiler, extreme movie manager, xbmc, personal video database (pvd), eax movie catalog (eax), dvd profiler, extreme movie manager (xmm) , movie collector pro, mymovies

GeneralInfo.Name: MyFilms
GeneralInfo.Author: Zebons, Guzzi
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
MyFilms is a movie plugin to use your ANTmovie catalog (AMC) video database or other external catalog managers in mediaportal.
The My Films plugin allows you to combine the media center features of MediaPortal with the advantages of the movie catalog/database of your choice - like the popular freeware Ant Movie Catalog (AMC), EAX Movie Catalog, Personal Video Database or shareware catalogs like DVD Profiler, Extreme Movie Manager (XMM), My Movies or Movie Collector.
My Films offers a huge amout of features to use and manage your movie collection inside and outside Mediaportal.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
This version is a maintenance release of MyFilms 6.0.
Please report bugs in MyFilms forum.
Features:
- Add regex grouping for studio and languages
- Remove 'Use MP Logos' option
- Allow users to select Test Mode more easily and display it in Setup/GUI
- Add regex matching to logo rule editor
- Current MyFilms is incompatible with MP 1.4.0
- Use Localized Plugin Name in CurrentModule
- Change Backnavigation behaviour to not step back when a view was called directly
- Add logo rules to support certification logos
Test Mode Features (6.1.0 preview):
- Improve Setup Wizard to support central config setups
- Allow sorting for Online Movie Info/Lists
- Add dialog for visual image selection (for Collection Covers)
- Download of collection covers from TMDB
- Improve Box Sets management in GUI
- Autorun AMCU when plugin starts
- Allow local caching for trailers of online content
- Precaching of movie DB on startup
- Add context search option for online content to seach local content by facade label keywords
- Add OnlineVideos search to movie context menu
- Allow download for trailers for multiple movies
- Add option to person context menu to get TMDB filmographie
- Add virtual path browsing
- Add online info about current, upcoming and most liked movies
- Trailer 'Scrobbling' - Play random trailers from a group of films
- Add "about" tab and credits
- Support for movie thumbs in Details screen & removal of old separate MyFilmsThumbs screen
- Add virtual path title
- View related persons view from Details Window
- Add OV stream player for trailers
- Actor screen
Fixes:
Grabber Engine - '#ADD#' uses wrong chars for splitting, should only use '|'
Selecting more than one local movie in Trakt opens the wrong movie in MyFilms
AMCU Update Movies Test Param does not display # Movies matched
Trailer/Clip detection can cause that a movie is handled as a trailer
Create Fanart does not work if you do a clean install of MP 1.4.0
Grabber engine does not display preview resutls
TMDB grabber does not add/update cover
Cover Manager does not download covers
IMDB-Full script is broken
hyperlink from basic homescreen to a specific DB results in MyFilms showing blank screen
Latest Media Handler does not work per Config
My Movies export to XML catalog, "SortTitle" to "FormattedTitle" not working
Trailers Button on Details Window causes Crash
Search History does not display selected Search in Virtual Keyboard
Layout button display is incorrect when you change layouts and return to MF
Skin Updates for MP13 final
Default view settings in Global Options not working properly
Remove message 'WatchedItem' from movie ended handling
Change encoding for AMCupdater created nfo files to UTF-8 for better compatibility with nfo grabber script
IMDB-OFDB Scraper broken
brackets should be removed from #myfilms.select property
Exception on item counts on certain timing conditions
Collection of structural changes of the Solution
Skinengine falls back to wprite mode when high order characters are pushed to GUIProperties
Long internet titles can result in "path too long" exceptions
When importing DVD/BR folders size calculation does not work
AMCupdater - "always ignore files" is case sensitive
Group/Collection covers cannot be handled, if the name contains invalid characters
Remove "star" on count indicator of filtered views
MyFilms as problems with some "Pictures" in catalog/Pictures folder
ampersand name issue
AMCupdater - Movie Manager issues causing DB corruption
Adding a filtered view to the menu does not create proper view
Playback events for physical discs are not processed properly
Remove IMDB.PT script from installer package and change the preset script for PT
Better error handling when no config present or skin files missing
Cinefacts has relaunched their website, so grabbers don't work anymore
Add GUI Global Options to change default config and default setting
GeneralInfo.Tags: movies, films, videos, myfilms, catalog, manager, ant movie catalog (amc), dvdprofiler, extreme movie manager, xbmc, personal video database (pvd), eax movie catalog (eax), dvd profiler, extreme movie manager (xmm) , movie collector pro, mymovies

DependencyItem.Message: MyFilms 6 requires Mediaportal 1.2 or higher.
DependencyItem.Name: MediaPortal

DependencyItem.Message: To use My Films online help and preview IMDB pages, BrowseTheWeb version 0.30 or higher must be installed.
DependencyItem.Name: Browse The Web

DependencyItem.Message: To access online trailers (incl. IMDB) from MyFilms, Online Videos v1.2 or higher must be installed.
DependencyItem.Name: OnlineVideos

DependencyItem.Name: SubCentral

GeneralInfo.Name: MyFilms
GeneralInfo.Author: Zebons, Guzzi
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
MyFilms is a movie plugin to use your ANTmovie catalog (AMC) video database or other external catalog managers in mediaportal.
The My Films plugin allows you to combine the media center features of MediaPortal with the advantages of the movie catalog/database of your choice - like the popular freeware Ant Movie Catalog (AMC), EAX Movie Catalog, Personal Video Database or shareware catalogs like DVD Profiler, Extreme Movie Manager (XMM), My Movies or Movie Collector.
My Films offers a huge amout of features to use and manage your movie collection inside and outside Mediaportal.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
This version is a feature release of MyFilms 6.1.
Please report bugs in MyFilms forum.
Features:
- Support 'Cleanup' option on Grabber Editor Search page for filebased reader grabbers like NFO
- Display attribution when downloading from TMDB - especially API
- MP 1.6/7/8 compatibility
- Remove Obsolete grabbers
- Certification logos by country
- Button for Trakt dailog window
- Jump to random movie overview card from all the movies that are on your catalogue
- Improve Setup Wizard to support central config setups
- Add support for TMDB ID to IMDB grabbers
- Allow sorting for Online Movie Info/Lists
- Upgrade fanart loader to TMDB v3
- Add dialog for visual image selection
- Download of collection covers from TMDB
- Improve Box Sets management in GUI
- Autorun AMCU when plugin starts
- Allow local caching for trailers of online content
- Precaching of movie DB on startup
- Add context search option for online content to seach local content by facade label keywords
- Add OnlineVideos search to movie context menu
- Allow trailer downloads for single movies via context menu
- Add more OV sites to trailer submenu to choose for searching trailers
- Allow download for trailers for multiple movies
- Add option to person context menu to get TMDB filmographie
- Allow manual selection of playback quality for online trailers
- Add virtual path browsing
- Add online info about current, upcoming and most liked movies
- Trailer 'Scrobbling' - Play random trailers from a group of films
- Add "about" tab and credits
- Support for movie thumbs in Details screen & removal of old separate MyFilmsThumbs screen
- Add virtual path title
- View related persons view from Details Window
- Add OV stream player for trailers
- Auto Register Trailers downloaded via Online Videos
- Remove Actor screen - is replaced by person facades
- Move verified items from 6.0.3 testmode to normal mode
- DB schema extension
- Update MF skininterfaceversion to 1.1 due to V6.1 changes
Fixes:
- Apectratio is not parsed properly for some globalizations
- Default Wide Skins need update
- Roles are no more displayed in TMDB movie list for a person
- Collection covers grabbed via TMDB grabbers don't display
- Grabber Editor displays error when using hardcoded names for filebased reader in Search URL
- Grabber may grab unpredicatable results when a parameter is not found
- External media player does not open film as pathname is not quoted in the command line
- Cannot import nfo files created by AMCU Update nfo files
- Trakt Friends no longer works
- Trakt (test internal menu) in test mode, does not work
- New movies don't display in global unwatched filter
- plugin fanart loading not working anymore - TMDB API v2.1 was retired on sep. 15th
- IMDB_Id field is not pushed to property
- List separators do not support "new line" separation
- Suppress some alerts
- "Online Infos" and adaption to TMDB v3 api
- Add GUI Global Options to change default config and default setting
GeneralInfo.Tags: movies, films, videos, myfilms, catalog, manager, ant movie catalog (amc), dvdprofiler, extreme movie manager, xbmc, personal video database (pvd), eax movie catalog (eax), dvd profiler, extreme movie manager (xmm) , movie collector pro, mymovies
